com.ibm.jaggr.core.cache

Interface IGzipCache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGenericCache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GzipCacheImpl

    public interface IGzipCache
extends IGenericCache
    Interface for a cache of gzipped modules

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IGzipCache.ICacheEntry
      The type of the cache entry is opaque to the user.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputStream getInputStream(String key, URI source, org.apache.commons.lang3.mutable.MutableInt retSize)
      Returns an input stream to the gzipped contents of the resource specified by source

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ibm.jaggr.core.cache.IGenericCache

        clear, contains, dump, getKeys, newInstance, setAggregator, size

    • Method Detail

      • getInputStream

        InputStream getInputStream(String key,
                         URI source,
                         org.apache.commons.lang3.mutable.MutableInt retSize)
                           throws IOException
        Returns an input stream to the gzipped contents of the resource specified by source
        Parameters:
        key - the cache key (typically the resource path from the request)
        source - the URI to the resource on the server
        retSize - Returned - the length of the gzipped content
        Returns:
        an input stream to the gzipped content for the resource
        Throws:
        IOException
